cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 360 mi SSW of Bermuda and 785 mi ESE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest, expected to slow and turn northwest toward the North Carolina/South Carolina coast late Thursday into Friday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the North Carolina coast between Cape Fear and Cape Lookout

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC and north of Duck NC to the NC/VA border; Tropical Storm Watch: NC/VA border to Cape Charles Light VA and Chesapeake Bay south of New Point Comfort
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: South Santee River SC to Duck NC including Albemarle and Pamlico Sounds; Storm Surge Warning: South Santee River SC to Duck NC including Albemarle and Pamlico Sounds
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impact expected along the coasts of South Carolina, North Carolina and portions of the Mid-Atlantic
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture could bring light to moderate rain early next week, but significant flooding is not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minimal operational impacts anticipated; monitor for potential upper-level remnants causing localized heavy rain.
